notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Abunku zai zama ba a sani ba cikin kwanaki 7 don
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Duk abinda kuka rubuta a wannan al'umma za a sanya shi ba a sani ba kuma a adana shi cikin kwanaki 7, bayan haka ba za ku iya share shi ko canza shi ba. Duba abubuwanku da ke ƙasa.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Duk abinda kuka rubuta a wannan rukuni za a sanya shi ba a sani ba kuma a adana shi cikin kwanaki 7, bayan haka ba za ku iya share shi ko canza shi ba. Duba abubuwanku da ke ƙasa.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Danna kan hanyar haɗin al'umma da ke ƙasa, shiga a matsayin admin kuma zaɓi Kula da Zamba daga menu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Yawan ayyukan da ake zargin zamba da su da kimanin kashi 75% na damar zamba
email.possibleFraudInformation: Tsarinmu na atomatik ya gano yiwuwar aikata zamba. Zaku iya duba sosai ta hanyar dubawa ta admin na Al'umma. Wasu daga cikin wannan ayyukan na iya kasancewa ba na zamba ba ne don haka ku yi taka tsantsan wajen bincike kafin ku share abun ciki.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: An yi alama ta atomatik akan wannan abun ciki a matsayin mai guba ta amfani da algorithms na AI da ke kiyasin gubar abun cikin. Zaku iya share abun cikin idan akwai buƙata.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Wani algorithm na AI ta atomatik ya yi alama akan hotunan gani da ke da alaƙa da wannan abun ciki. Wannan algorithm yana duba hotuna don yiwuwar hotunan manya, tashin hankali, likitanci, da hotunan da suka shafi jima'i. Zaku iya share abun cikin idan akwai buƙata.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Wani lokacin algorithm na AI yana lissafin maki mara daidai, a irin wannan yanayin kada ku damu, ba ku buƙatar ɗaukar wani mataki ba kuma za ku iya watsi da wannan imel.
email.automaticToxicityHowLikely: Yaya dacewa (%) da zama mai guba
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: Rubutun Turanci da aka yi amfani da shi don maki
email.newPointedAddedToThisIdea: An ƙara sabon maki zuwa wannan ra'ayin
email.newPointedAddedToIdea: An ƙara sabon maki zuwa ga ra'ayinka
email.hasBeenMarkedDown: an alama shi da ba shi da amfani
email.writtenByUser: Rubutawa ta mai amfani da suna
email.youCanViewItHere: Za ka iya duba shi anan
email.postReport: An rahoto ra'ayi saboda keta sharuddan
email.pointReport: An rahoto maki saboda keta sharuddan
email.user_invite_1: An gayyace ka ka shiga cikin...
email.user_invite_2: Danna kan hanyar haɗin ko manna shi a cikin mashigar adireshin bincike don karɓar gayyatar
email.pointUnhelpfulSelf: An alama maki a matsayin mara amfani ga ra'ayina
email.pointUnhelpful: An alama maki a matsayin mara amfani
email.pointHelpfulSelf: An alama maki a matsayin mai amfani ga ra'ayina
email.pointHelpful: An alama maki a matsayin mai amfani
email.reset_password_1: Ga hanyar haɗi don canza kalmarka ta sirri.
email.reset_password_2: Idan ba ku nemi wannan ba, don Allah ku watsar da wannan imel.
email.reset_password_3: Kalmar sirrinku ba za ta canza ba har sai kun shiga mahadar da ke sama kuma ku ƙirƙiri sabuwa.
